comments:
Steps to reproduce:

1.Download the designfiles:

TopNPercent.rptdesign
TopSellingProducts.rptdesign

from website: http://www.eclipse.org/birt/phoenix/examples/

2.Copy them to the Navigator.

3.Preview them

Expected result:

1.Preview with no errors

Actual result:
